sourcesContent:
// theme.js
export const theme = {
    backgroundColor: "#121212", // Dark background
    primaryColor: "#bb86fc", // Light purple
    secondaryColor: "#03dac6", // Teal
    borderColor: "#333", // Dark border
    textColor: "#e0e0e0", // Light text
    cardBackground: "#1f1f1f", // Dark card background
    cardHoverBackground: "#333", // Darker card background on hover
    buttonColor: "#bb86fc", // Button color
    buttonHoverColor: "#a06efc",
    backgroundColor: "#121212", // Dark background
  cardBackground: "#1e1e1e", // Slightly lighter background for cards
  textColor: "#e0e0e0", // Light text color
  accentColor: "#bb86fc", // Accent color for highlights
  topBarBackground: "#1f1f1f", // Dark background for the top bar
  borderColor: "#333333", // Color for borders // Button hover color
  };
